title: Graves Crits + Warlord's Bloodlust
body:
Question about this mastery, with graves when he crits he just shots extra bullets but all those bullets do normal damage, there is no technical crit involved, you just shoot twice as many to match the double damage, that makes sense.

BUT if you do not actually crit, then warlord's bloodlust doesn't work? I'd like to think it does but it actually doesn't make sense to work since you don't actually crit do you?

replies.body: his first bullet crits (75-110% damage) bullet

i disagree, when he crits he fires 8 bullets instead of 4 and with IE he fires 10.  

His first bullet always done 75% damage scaling to 110% damage. If he crits, then he shots more bullets with his original 4
pay close attention to his crits. You can see the 907 damge + all the little normal text 119s
